name: 孫勤昱
objective:
本課程將介紹程式設計中面臨的安全議題。學生將透過這堂課程，理解各種不良撰寫習慣與不考慮安全下所撰寫的程式所造成的漏洞與基礎知識；同時，理解惡意者攻擊的原理。在本課程結束時，學生能夠具備安全開發程式應用之基本能力。
This course will introduce security issues in programming. Through this course, students will understand the vulnerabilities and basic knowledge caused by various bad programming habits and programming without considering security. Students will understand the principles of malicious attacks. After this course, students will be able to securely develop programming applications.
